html: 4.26.17  4:57 pm   What are you 100% certain about?

4.26.17  4:21 pm   does being in a relationship limit a person's freedom?

     you'll have to try it and see

4.26.17  4:13 pm   Are snakes real?

     yes

4.26.17  3:51 pm   Is your new video the history of one country?

     no

4.26.17  3:31 pm   how do you feel about dogs?

     fine

4.26.17  2:08 pm   what are some meta thoughts that go through your mind when you're unable to answer a question the way you want to because it wouldn't fit the style of your usual answers?

     i always answer questions the way i want

4.26.17  2:05 pm   do u think its possible to transmit thoughts from brain to brain purely through electromagnetic shit, no talking or hand gestures or any of that shit

     maybe

4.26.17  1:34 pm   has the new video taken longer than you thought it would?

     maybe, although i knew it was going to take a ridiculously long time

4.26.17  12:45 pm   How do you ruin Christmas in a really safe way? I don't know how to, but I am sure there is a link to somewhere.

     it's impossible to ruin christmas. each time you try, it will only get stronger

4.26.17  12:44 pm   do you say dipshit in the new video?

     no

      shit?

     yes

      fuck?

     yes

4.26.17  12:42 pm   When do you wake up every day

     usually about 6 to 12 hours after i go to sleep

4.26.17  12:28 pm   have you ever accidentally made the same video twice

     maybe
4.26.17  12:19 pm   where did you get the idea of making your videos?

4.26.17  12:10 pm   Will you ever make another history of (country) video? If yes, when?

     does it count if i do more than a country

4.26.17  12:05 pm   would you ever consider making a full album of longer songs?

     longer than what

4.26.17  11:53 am   how do you feel about friendship?

     nice, very good, etc

4.26.17  11:29 am   does having spare time mean you are doing something not right?

     no

4.26.17  10:35 am   When you upload the video to YouTube, how can I let you know which comment is mine? Maybe a secret code?

     i don't know

4.26.17  10:08 am   Which of your videos do you think has been the most efficient at delivering the most thoughts in the shortest runtime?

     the one with pepe

4.26.17  10:07 am   Are you going to cash in on the whole baroque music thing before it goes out of style?

     no

4.26.17  9:14 am   how do you feel about the fact that some of us view you as (among a multitude of other things) an agony aunt?

     fine

4.26.17  9:11 am   Bill, what is your ultimate mission?

     figure out what the hell is going on

4.26.17  8:35 am   what is art

     anything

4.26.17  3:43 am   Do you think tangible holograms will be really cool if they ever make them, or will there be a shitty drawback, like touching them gives you a static shock or something

     that sounds cool either way
4.26.17  3:38 am   will you tell me a story?

4.26.17  2:18 am   Someone once said that only a musician can truly appreciate silence.

     i suspect foley artists can appreciate it as well

      Do you appreciate silence?

     yes, i particularly appreciate it when it is used with other sounds before or after it
4.26.17  1:25 am   which planet is your favorite

4.26.17  12:47 am   how does one determine what "adult language" is

     spend some time with adults, and see what language they use

4.25.17  11:36 pm   Do you think stepping on books is disrespectful?

     it can be done disrespectfully, if you want

4.25.17  11:32 pm   Do you ever wonder what if this world isn't real and you are literally the only human being on the planet, and all your memories of other people are fake, and all the questions you get here are just you posting it and forgetting it in an insane attempt to trick yourself into believing that there are other people out there as you slowly lose your mind?

     no

4.25.17  10:35 pm   You know, because light takes time to travel from the object we are looking at to our eyes, we are technically always looking at the past. How does this make you feel?

     i'm not sure, it has always been that way, so i am not sure how it would feel otherwise

4.25.17  10:05 pm   SENDING VIDEO CLEANUP/ASSEMBLY HYPE VIBES YOUR WAY MAGNIFICENT MOON BROTHA WURTZ-MAN

     thank you
4.25.17  9:49 pm   are you going back to 2-6 second videos uploaded more regularly when you're done with that big ol' project you're working on

4.25.17  9:38 pm   do you use adult language in hotewig

     yes, and kids' language also
4.25.17  9:35 pm   are you a boobs or an ass kinda guy?

4.25.17  8:54 pm   still doing new projects?

     oh hell yeah

4.25.17  8:50 pm   Given there's just small things left to do, do you think the video will be done this or next week?

     that would be nice

4.25.17  8:49 pm   what is your opinion on snakes

     they are ok

4.25.17  7:36 pm   How do you work on the score for a video like this? Like project setup. You have jingles and effects but they have to be timed with narration and a video which are both made with different programs and then also have to make it ADD something new to the video. Thats a lot to manage

     if you start with much shorter and simpler projects and work your way up, all the techniques and procedures will easily and naturally fall into place

4.25.17  7:28 pm   how many days' worth of loose ends do you have left to tie

     i will keep track and let you know when i'm done, so that way you will know
4.25.17  6:43 pm   how do you know i'm not just the same person asking you a bunch of questions, viewing your videos a bunch, and making it look like you have fans

4.25.17  5:39 pm   Do you think we should build a wall in front of Mexico

     which side is the front

4.25.17  4:39 pm   Do you answer questions with the first answer that comes to your head

     sometimes

     or do you give a little more thought to each one?

     sometimes

4.25.17  4:31 pm   Why do not you make a page for the frequently asked question: "How is the progress?"? I am sure plenty have been asked by now.

     i want to leave it open for a different answer every time, even though i have so far given the same answer every time

4.25.17  3:47 pm   what are your thoughts about pebbles ?

     they are small. well at least they are supposed to be small

4.25.17  3:46 pm   what do you sexually identify as ?

     a person

4.25.17  3:19 pm   how much longer of the video do you have left to produce?

     little bits of all of it
4.25.17  3:16 pm   How long have you been making music for?

4.25.17  2:12 pm   Do you ever feel bad when "fans" demand you make more content at a faster rate, rather than at your own schedule.

     i normally try to make content as fast as possible. if people want it to go faster, that's fine, but it's impossible

4.25.17  1:39 pm   Bill help, there are many obnoxious people, how do I establish dominance by being the most obnoxious

     there are a hundred ways
